Article.ArticleTitle: Staphylococcus aureus Toxins: Promoter or Handicap during Infection?

Abstract.AbstractText: Staphylococcus aureus is an opportunistic and versatile pathogen that can cause several diseases, which range from acute and destructive, to chronic and difficult-to-treat infections [...].
